name: tim
text: I remember that book - it was available for only like $10. It makes me laugh to think that Ray since then has no eyes under his glasses.

name: stuart
text:
Ain't no eyes under them glasses

Sockets is closed

Can't you...

See

text: That thing he does with his eyes at the end of that one would be absolutely horrifying

text: *rrrRIP!*

text: You mean these eyes?

text: THESE EYES.

name: theguitarhero
text: These eyes that I.... boned???

text: Philippe is five years old!

text:
oh god, i'm browsing through the archives and...oh god i can't stop laughing

chubby chubby chubby

text: .. cry every night for you

name: stuart
text:
I think my heart's explodin'! THESE EYES!

(okay boys let's just leave it there it's already hard enough for me to browse my inbox because I posted once in that thread)

text: These Knives!

text: "These eyes can do anything! Just ask...Baby Jesus!"

name: catachresis
text: Dang, Phillipe really smacks those glasses off Ray's face. He brings sack here.

text: He really feels strongly about Ray lying to his potential customers.

name: gouldgonewild
text: You better believe he has wicked sack, catachresis.

name: cousinted
text: A comment left by cousinted was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Thorfinn, Howard, nutmeg, anitrophaeron)

name: dovey
text: NON-CANON

name: chloraloner
text: He's really got a set on him.

name: centipede_damascus
text: I hear you can get a good price for your eyes if they are in pretty good condition.

name: saint
text: Robert Johnson just lost all his respect for Ray.

name: deancain29
text: Philippe's nasty streak.

name: biddlebubbly
text: Is it just me or is this strip in need of a contrast boost?

name: riazm
text: A comment left by riazm was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, Howard, le_chien_manquee, biddlebubbly)

name: semiquaver
text: Yeah you are going to get lamed mainly because the dude was right and his monitor is fine.  You may want to check yours out though.

name: sabalpalm
text: yeah i think youre right. its not contrast at all. in all the rest of the strips, the black is black and the white is white but this one is fuzzy.

name: biddlebubbly
text:
Yeah you'd have to have ray's eyes to think this strip's brightness/contrast isn't slightly hosed.

Looks like you're the one with the badly calibrated monitor, sir.

name: biddlebubbly
text:
[IMGS OFF]

I'm sorry I just couldn't take it anymore.

name: farqussus
text: A comment left by farqussus was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by nighttoad, Overmedicated, Thorfinn, relaxing, miaou)

name: biddlebubbly
text: The contrast my brother. Look at the blacks.

name: overmedicated
text: I'm never trusting anyone with an AoE2 logo ever again.

name: semiquaver
text:
It's true. Look at those blacks. LOOK AT THEM.

Oh, wait....

name: farqussus
text: OK. I see. I don't know that I needed to be lamed for it, but I can take a hint.

name: stuart
text: The contrast is off to represent that this is non-canon.

name: hollis
text: So creepy...

text: whoa, Philippe got kinda uppity in this one, but it was for a good reason.  Ray shouldn't have sold his eyes

AAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!

dang.

text: Dang Philippe, you got a pair on you; which is more than can be said for Ray.

text: Hey, where did Phillipe get his aggro?  Isn't this completely out of character for the lad?

name: rbisme
text: thats phillipes LORD slap.

text: Now Ray can write raps about what it's like to have eye problems.

name: missbee
text:
You ain't gonna have eye problems if you have no dang eyes.
But raps about that would be pretty cool, yeah.

name: trap
text: Ray, you sold your eyes! How come?

name: radarjammer
text: I've never seen Philippe so genuinely outraged.

text: A great achewood to start someone with.

text: I guess he got his eyes back the next day.

text: Top ten Achewood endings?  YES.
